attributes.title: Stop the Hindu Holocaust! Volume 3
attributes.description:
23 April 2020
*PARAMASHIVA'S MESSAGE DIRECTLY FROM KAILASA:

*TODAY I WANTED EVERYONE OF YOU TO UNDERSTAND: INDIAN MEDIA IS HEAVILY FUNDED, BUILT AND OWNED BY ANTI-HINDU ELEMENTS WITH THE ONLY PURPOSE OF ELIMINATING HINDUISM FROM INDIA. IT DOES NOT SPREAD NEWS OR FACTS OF WHAT HAPPENED. IT SPREADS ITS CLEAR NARRATIVE USING OPINIONATED, DISTORTED, BLATANT LIES AND RUMOURS.

*I HAVE SOME EVIDENCE TO SHOW THAT MANY OF THE ORGANISATIONS - INTERNATIONAL BODIES - CLEARLY PROVE INDIAN MEDIA IS THE WORST CORRUPT MEDIA.

*THE HINDU DIASPORA ALL OVER THE WORLD SHOULD STOP TRUSTING MASS MEDIA CULT AS THE SOURCE OF INFORMATION. THAT IS ALL I AM REQUESTING. I WANT TO BRING THESE TRUTHS TO THE WORLD THROUGH THIS SERIES OF SATSANGS: “STOP THE HINDU HOLOCAUST” FOR 16 DAYS. THE INDIAN MASS MEDIA CULT IS MOST CORRUPT.

*THE AMOUNT OF HATE SPEECH THEY DO ON HINDUISM. I HAVE EXPERIENCED IT FIRSTHAND. WHEN THEY TRIED TO ATTACK ME, THEY SPOKE ABOUT ALL THE MAJOR HINDU PRINCIPLES AND DESTROYED THEM USING MY NAME. THEY STARTED USING MY NAME AS A CHARACTERLESS NAME. THEN THE WORSHIP OF SHIVA LINGA COMES. THERE IS A HUGE PICTURE OF SHIVALINGA CALLED AS PHALLUS WORSHIP AND MALE ORGAN WORSHIP WITH A HUGE QUESTION MARK ON IT. THE SHIVALINGA WE WORSHIP IN THE VAIDYA SAROVAR THEY ARE CALLING AS PHALLUS WORSHIP. LINGA IS TREATED AS PHALLUS BY MAX MULLER.

*AND THE DEVI BHAVA SAMADHI DARSHAN, THEY CALLED AS CROSS-DRESSING. UNFORTUNATELY, THE LAST TWO GENERATION HINDUS FORGOT BHAVA SAMADHI DARSHAN IS OUR TRADITION. I CAN GIVE YOU SO MANY THOUSAND EXAMPLES. RAMAKRISHNA USED TO WEAR SAREE WHEN HE WAS IN DEVI BHAVA SAMADHI. JNANANANDA SWAMI WORE A SAREE DURING NAVARATRI. TILL TODAY, THE PRIEST WHO DOES THE NOON PUJA IN TIRUVANAIKKAVAL TEMPLE, HAS TO WEAR A SAREE AND DRESS UP AS DEVI AND IN THE DEVI BHAVA SAMADHI HE HAS TO DO PUJA TO PARAMASHIVA.

*THE WORST THINGS IS, HINDUS ARE MADE TO FORGET ABOUT THEIR ROOTS AND THE 99% INDIAN MASS MEDIA CULT INCLUDING THE ENTERTAINMENT INDUSTRY HAVE A CLEAR AGENDA TO PUSH THEIR NARRATIVE: ELIMINATE EVERYTHING TO DO WITH HINDUISM. KEEP US AS CULTURAL SLAVES, DESTROY OUR IDENTITY AND BACKBONE. FIRST THEY TEACH US THAT HINDU HISTORY IS HINDU MYTHOLOGY.

*EVEN HINDU SCHOLARS ARE BELIEVING OUR PURANAS ARE MYTHOLOGY. STOP THIS STUPIDITY! 18 PURANAS AND UPAPURANAS ARE RECORDED COSMIC HISTORY OF HINDUISM.

*FROM THERE IT STARTS AND IT IS WE WHO TAUGHT THE WORLD HOW TO CALCULATE DAYS AND DATES. NOW WE'RE BEING ACCUSED OF NOT KNOWING DAYS AND DATES! OUR CALENDAR AND OUR SYSTEM CAN CALCULATE UPTO MILLIONS OF YEARS PRECISELY. I CAN PRECISELY TELL YOU THE DATE WHEN VIKRAMADITYA WAS CORONATED OR WHEN RAMA WAS BORN.

*UNFORTUNATELY, WE ARE FORCED TO BELIEVE, BRAINWASHED BY INDIAN MASS MEDIA CULT, THAT OUR PURANAS ARE MYTHOLOGY AND THROUGH THIS FALSE NARRATIVE, FIRST OUR ROOTS ARE SEPARATED FROM US. ONCE WE LOSE THE ROOT, WE LOOK ONLY UPTO THOSE MASS MEDIA CULT TO MAKE ANY DECISION ABOUT OUR LIFE.

*EVEN MY OWN SINCERE HINDU DISCIPLES ASK ME,’ WHAT IS THE ALTERNATIVE FOR THIS NARRATIVE IN WHICH WE ARE STUCK SWAMIJI?’ THE INDIAN MASS MEDIA CULT HAS BRAINWASHED THEM SO MUCH! EVEN HINDUS DON'T KNOW WHAT ARE THE OTHER OPTIONS.

*SEE THIS REPORT: INDIAN MEDIA IS THE MOST CORRUPT WITH NO ETHICS OR RESPONSIBILITY. IT IS THE SOCIAL MEDIA THAT IS EXPOSING THE CORRUPT INDIAN MEDIA.

*EVEN IN THIS PALGARH MOB LYNCHING OF SADHUS, CRIMINAL NARRATIVE IS DONE. PLEASE SEE. WORST CRIMINALS! AND NOW I WANT YOU TO SEE THE WELL DOCUMENTED LIFE OF KALPAVRIKSHA GIRI MAHARAJ. WE HAVE ENOUGH VIDEOS TO SHOW THAT HE IS A WELL-KNOWN SADHU WHO LIVED A MAHANT LIFE!

*NO EDUCATED MAN WILL BE READY TO BELIEVE, POLICE COULD NOT IDENTIFY HE IS A SADHU, THAT HE IS NOT A THIEF, THAT HE IS NOT A MISTAKEN IDENTITY. HE HAS REACHED THE POLICE STATION ALIVE AND THERE WERE DOZENS OF POLICE OFFICERS, NOT THREE OR FOUR. SURELY, HE AND HIS ASSISTANT SADHU AND THE DRIVER HAD THEIR VEHICLE. THEY COULD HAVE CALLED AND VERIFIED HE IS A SADHU AND A MAHANT. SO THE DOZENS OF POLICE OFFICERS ARE TRYING TO CLAIM THEY ARE NOT ABLE TO IDENTIFY HE IS A SADHU?! WHOM ARE YOU CHEATING?!

*O HINDUS ALL OVER THE WORLD! WE NEED TO TAKE THIS TO INTERNATIONAL ATTENTION. FUNDAMENTALLY WE ARE NONVIOLENT PEOPLE. WE ARE NOT TERRORISTS TO KILL THEM BACK. LET US AT LEAST TAKE THIS TO THE ATTENTION OF THE INTERNATIONAL COMMUNITY LIKE UNITED NATIONS.
